title: Garfield from the Trash Bin: Rescued Rejects & Outrageous Outtakes
description: Dumpster Diving!One cat's trash is another cat's treasure, and in this all-new book, Garfield creator Jim Davis has collected the best of the worst: never-before-seen rejected comic strips, questionable covers, silly sketches, gross gags, and over-the-top, over-the-edge outtakes sure to offend just about everyone.So hold your nose and dig in!
author: Jim Davis
